fees: Our tuition and fees vary based on the program and schedule.

curriculum: Our curriculum focuses on cognitive, social, and motor skill development through play-based learning.
safety: We prioritize safety with secure entry systems, trained staff, and health protocols.
health protocols: We follow strict health guidelines, including regular sanitation, temperature checks, and emergency medical procedures.
food and nutrition: We provide balanced meals and snacks, accommodating dietary restrictions and allergies.
teachers: Our caregivers and educators are highly qualified and experienced in early childhood development.
staff qualifications: All our staff members are certified in child development and first aid. Let me know if you’d like to see credentials or training details.
portal: Our parent portal allows you to check attendance, progress reports, and daily activities.
communication: We keep parents updated through newsletters, messaging, and meetings.
